parse.title: Qliphort Scout
parse.wikitext:
{{CardTable2 | fr_name = Sentinelle Qliphort | de_name = Qliphort-Kundschafter | ko_name = 클리포트 툴 | it_name = Scout Qliphort | pt_name = Batedor Qliphort | es_name = Explorador Qlifuerte | ja_name = クリフォート・ツール | romaji_name = Kurifōto Tsūru | trans_name = Qliphort Tool | image = QliphortScout-PEVO-EN-SR-1E.png | attribute = EARTH | types = Machine / Pendulum | level = 5 | pendulum_scale = 9 | atk = 1000 | def = 2800 | password = 65518099 | pendulum_effect_types = Continuous-like, Condition, Ignition-like | pendulum_effect = You cannot [[Special Summon]] [[Monster Card|monsters]], except "[[Qli]]" monsters. This [[effect]] cannot be [[negate]]d. [[Once per turn]]: You can [[pay]] 800 [[LP]]; [[Add a card|add]] 1 "Qli" card from your [[Main Deck|Deck]] to your [[hand]], except "Qliphort Scout". | lore = ''Booting in Replica Mode...
An error has occurred while executing C:\[[Sophia, Goddess of Rebirth|sophia]]\[[zefra]].exe
Unknown publisher.
Allow C:\[[Tierra, Source of Destruction|tierra]]\[[qli]]phort.exe ? ...[Y]
Booting in Autonomy Mode...'' | fr_pendulum_effect = Vous ne pouvez pas [[Special Summon|Invoquer Spécialement]] de [[Monster Card|monstres]] (monstres "[[Qli]]" exclus). Cet [[Effect|effet]] ne peut pas être [[Negate|annulé]]. [[Once per turn|Une fois par tour]] : vous pouvez [[pay]]er 800 [[LP]] ; [[Add a card|ajoutez]] 1 carte "Qli" ("Sentinelle Qliphort" exclu) depuis votre [[Deck]] à votre [[Hand|main]]. | fr_lore = ''Démarrage en Mode Réplique...
Une erreur est survenue lors de l’exécution de C:\[[Sophia, Goddess of Rebirth|sophia]]\[[zefra]].exe
Éditeur inconnu.
Autoriser C:\[[Infernoid Tierra|tierra]]\qliphort.exe ? ...[O]
Démarrage en Mode Autonomie...'' | de_pendulum_effect = Du kannst keine als [[Special Summon|Spezialbeschwörung]] beschwören, außer „[[Qli]]“-[[Monster Card|Monstern]]. Dieser [[Effect|Effekt]] kann nicht [[Negate|annulliert]] werden. [[Once per turn|Einmal pro Spielzug]]: Du kannst 800 [[LP]] [[Pay|zahlen]]; [[Add a card|füge]] einer [[Hand]] 1 „Qli“-Karte von deinem [[Deck]] hinzu, außer „Qliphort-Kundschafter“. | de_lore = ''Replika-Modus wird gebootet...
Fehler beim Ausführen von C:\[[Sophia, Goddess of Rebirth|sophia]]\[[zefra]].exe
Unbekannter Entwickler.
C:\[[Infernoid Tierra|tierra]]\qliphort.exe zulassen? ...[J]
Autonomie-Modus wird gebootet...'' | it_pendulum_effect = Non puoi Evocare Specialmente mostri, eccetto mostri "Qli". Questo effetto non può essere annullato. Una volta per turno: puoi pagare 800 LP; aggiungi 1 carta "Qli" dal tuo Deck alla tua mano, eccetto "Scout Qliphort". | it_lore = ''Avvio in Modalità Replica...
Si è verificato un errore durante l'esecuzione di C:\sophia\zefra.exe
Autore sconosciuto.
Permettere l'avvio di C:\tierra\qliphort.exe ? <S/N>...[S]
Avvio in Modalità Autonoma...'' | pt_pendulum_effect = Você não pode [[Summon|Invocar]] [[Monster Card|monstros]] por [[Special Summon|Invcação-Especial]], exceto monstros "[[Qli]]". Este [[Effect|efeito]] não pode ser [[Negate|negado]]. [[Once per turn|Uma vez por turno]]: você pode [[Pay|pagar]] 800 [[LP|PV]]; [[Add a card|adicione]] 1 card "Qli" do seu [[Deck]] à sua [[Hand|mão]], exceto "Batedor Qliphort". | pt_lore = ''Reiniciando em Modo de Réplica...
Um erro aconteceu ao executar C:\[[Sophia, Goddess of Rebirth|sophia]]\[[zefra]].exe
Autor desconhecido.
Permitir C:\[[Infernoid Tierra|tierra]]\qliphort.exe ? <S/N>...[S]
Reinciando em Modo Autônomo...'' | es_pendulum_effect = No puedes Invocar [[Monster Card|monstruos]] de [[Special Summon|Modo Especial]], excepto monstruos "[[Qli]]". Este [[Effect|efecto]] no puede ser [[Negate|negado]]. [[Once per turn|Una vez por turno]]: puedes [[Pay|pagar]] 800 [[LP]]; [[Add a card|añade]] a tu [[Hand|mano]] 1 carta "Qli" en tu [[Deck]], excepto "Explorador Qlifuerte". | es_lore = ''Iníciando en Modo Réplica...
Ocurrió un error mientras se ejecutaba C:\[[Sophia, Goddess of Rebirth|sophia]]\[[zefra]].exe
Editor desconocido.
¿Permitir ejecutar C:\[[Infernoid Tierra|tierra]]\qlifuerte.exe? <S/N>.. [S]
Iníciando en Modo Autónomo...'' | ja_pendulum_effect = ①：{{ruby|自|じ}}{{ruby|分|ぶん}}は「[[Qli|クリフォート]]」[[Monster Card|モンスターしか]][[Special Summon|{{ruby|特|とく}}{{ruby|殊|しゅう}}{{ruby|召|しょう}}{{ruby|喚|かん}}できない]]。この[[Effect|{{ruby|効|こう}}{{ruby|果|か}}は]][[Negate|{{ruby|無|む}}{{ruby|効|こう}}{{ruby|化|か}}されない]]。②：[[Once per turn|１ターンに１{{ruby|度|ど}}]]、８００[[LP|{{ruby|ＬＰ|ライフポイント}}を]][[Pay|{{ruby|払|は}}って]][[Activate|{{ruby|発|はつ}}{{ruby|動|どう}}できる]]。[[Deck|デッキから]]「クリフォート・ツール」以外の「クリフォート」カード１枚を[[Hand|{{ruby|手|て}}{{ruby|札|ふだ}}に]][[Add a card|{{ruby|加|くわ}}える]]。 | ja_lore = システムをレプリカモードで{{ruby|起|き}}{{ruby|動|どう}}する{{ruby|準|じゅん}}{{ruby|備|び}}をしています...
C:¥[[Sophia, Goddess of Rebirth|sophia]]¥[[Zefra|sefiroth]].exe {{ruby|実|じっ}}{{ruby|行|こう}}{{ruby|中|ちゅう}}にエラーが{{ruby|発|はっ}}{{ruby|生|せい}}しました。
{{ruby|次|つぎ}}の{{ruby|不|ふ}}{{ruby|明|めい}}な{{ruby|発|はっ}}{{ruby|行|こう}}{{ruby|元|もと}}からのファイルを{{ruby|実|じっ}}{{ruby|行|こう}}しようとしています。
C:¥[[Infernoid Tierra|tierra]]¥qliphoth.exe の{{ruby|実|じっ}}{{ruby|行|こう}}を{{ruby|許|きょ}}{{ruby|可|か}}しますか？ ...[Y]
システムを{{ruby|自|じ}}{{ruby|立|りつ}}モードで{{ruby|起|き}}{{ruby|動|どう}}します。 | trans_lore = ''Preparing to boot system in Replica Mode...
An error has occurred while executing C:\[[Sophia, Goddess of Rebirth|sophia]]\[[Zefra|sefiroth]].exe
Attempting to run the following program from an unknown publisher.
Allow to run C:\[[Tierra, Source of Destruction|tierra]]\[[Qliphort|qliphoth]].exe ? ...[Y]
Booting system in Autonomy Mode.'' | ko_pendulum_effect = ①: 자신은 "[[Qli|클리포트]]" [[Monster Card|몬스터밖에]] [[Special Summon|특수 소환할]] 수 없다. 이 [[Effect|효과는]] [[Negate|무효화되지]] 않는다. ②: [[Once per turn|1턴에 1번]], 800 [[LP]]를 [[Pay|지불하고]] [[Activate|발동할]] 수 있다. [[Deck|덱에서]] "클리포트 툴" 이외의 "클리포트" 카드 1장을 [[Hand|패에]] [[Add a card|넣는다]]. | ko_lore = 시스템을 레플리카 모드로 기동할 준비를 하고 있습니다...
C:₩[[Sophia, Goddess of Rebirth|sophia]]₩[[Zefra|sefiroth]].exe 실행중에 에러가 발생했습니다.
다음의 알 수 없는 발행원으로부터의 프로그램을 실행하려고 합다.
C:₩[[Infernoid Tierra|tierra]]₩qliphoth.exe의 실행을 허가하시겠습니까? ...[Y]
시스템을 자율 모드로 기동합니다. | en_sets = NECH-EN021; The New Challengers; Ultra Rare MP15-EN144; 2015 Mega-Tin Mega Pack; Ultra Rare PEVO-EN057; Pendulum Evolution; Super Rare | fr_sets = NECH-FR021; The New Challengers; Ultra Rare MP15-FR144; 2015 Mega-Tin Mega Pack; Ultra Rare PEVO-FR057; Pendulum Evolution; Super Rare | de_sets = NECH-DE021; The New Challengers; Ultra Rare MP15-DE144; 2015 Mega-Tin Mega Pack; Ultra Rare PEVO-DE057; Pendulum Evolution; Super Rare | it_sets = NECH-IT021; The New Challengers; Ultra Rare MP15-IT144; 2015 Mega-Tin Mega Pack; Ultra Rare PEVO-IT057; Pendulum Evolution; Super Rare | pt_sets = NECH-PT021; The New Challengers; Ultra Rare MP15-PT144; 2015 Mega-Tin Mega Pack; Ultra Rare PEVO-PT057; Pendulum Evolution; Super Rare | sp_sets = NECH-SP021; The New Challengers; Ultra Rare MP15-SP144; 2015 Mega-Tin Mega Pack; Ultra Rare PEVO-SP057; Pendulum Evolution; Super Rare | jp_sets = NECH-JP021; The New Challengers; Rare 20AP-JP098; 20th Anniversary Pack 2nd Wave; Normal Parallel Rare LVP1-JP062; LINK VRAINS Pack; Common | kr_sets = NECH-KR021; The New Challengers; Rare 20AP-KR098; 20th Anniversary Pack 2nd Wave; Normal Parallel Rare LVP1-KR062; LINK VRAINS Pack; Common | archseries = Qli | supports_archetypes = Qli | action = * Effect that cannot be negated * Adds from Deck to hand | summoning = Restricts the player's Special Summons to archetype specific monsters | life_points = Pays Life Points for cost | misc = Limited activations | database_id = 11353 }}
